001package edu.cnm.deepdive.leavemealone.controller;
002
003import android.location.Location;
004import android.os.Bundle;
005import android.view.LayoutInflater;
006import android.view.View;
007import android.view.ViewGroup;
008import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
009import androidx.annotation.Nullable;
010import androidx.fragment.app.Fragment;
011import androidx.navigation.NavController;
012import androidx.navigation.Navigation;
013import com.google.android.gms.location.FusedLocationProviderClient;
014import com.google.android.gms.location.LocationServices;
015import com.google.android.gms.tasks.OnSuccessListener;
016import dagger.hilt.android.AndroidEntryPoint;
017import edu.cnm.deepdive.leavemealone.databinding.FragmentControlsBinding;
018import edu.cnm.deepdive.leavemealone.model.pojo.GPSCoord;
019
020/**
021 * A simple {@link Fragment} subclass. Use the {@link ControlsFragment#newInstance} factory method
022 * to create an instance of this fragment.
023 */
024@AndroidEntryPoint
025public class ControlsFragment extends Fragment{
026
027  private FragmentControlsBinding binding;
028
029  public ControlsFragment() {
030    // Required empty public constructor
031  }
032
033  @Override
034  public View onCreateView(
035      LayoutInflater inflater, ViewGroup container, Bundle savedInstanceState) {
036    binding = FragmentControlsBinding.inflate(inflater, container, false);
037    return binding.getRoot();
038  }
039
040  /**
041   * This provides the basic navigation required for the app.  From here, the alarm may be
042   * activated directly, the system may be armed and locations may be set for future reference.
043   * @param view
044   * @param savedInstanceState
045   */
046  @Override
047  public void onViewCreated(@NonNull View view, @Nullable Bundle savedInstanceState) {
048    super.onViewCreated(view, savedInstanceState);
049    NavController navController = Navigation
050        .findNavController(view);
051    binding.soundAlarm.setOnClickListener(
052        (v)-> navController.navigate(ControlsFragmentDirections.navigateSounding()));
053    binding.armAlarm.setOnClickListener(
054        (v)-> navController.navigate(ControlsFragmentDirections.navigateArm()));
055    binding.setLocation.setOnClickListener(
056        (v)-> navController.navigate(ControlsFragmentDirections.navigateSetLocation()));
057    binding.displayLocations.setOnClickListener(
058        (v)-> navController.navigate(ControlsFragmentDirections.navigateDisplayLocations()));
059  }
060
061  @Override
062  public void onDestroyView() {
063    binding = null;
064    super.onDestroyView();
065  }
066}
067
